1.0.name: wordpress/warning-button
1.0.description: This plugin add a "warning button" at the bottom of your content to send notification to the administrator. when you click the button, an email notification is sent to the administrator in order to indicate that the current page contains inappropriate content. You can set this informations : * Email of the administrator * Subject of the notification * A template for the email body This extension is compatible with multisite.
